sentences.en: Globally, average ages will continue rising, particularly in rich countries.
sentences.cn: 随指数一道发布的报告称,全球平均年龄将继续提升, 尤其在富国.

sentences.en: Globally, the movie has brought in $ 275 million, Paramount said Sunday.

sentences.en: Globally, there are over 33 million people living with HIV.
